item.title: Microsoft Sentinel Project Deployment Tracker
item.description:
A noted pain point in the current OOB workbook is the need for manual updates to the watchlist to monitor migration or deployment status. In contrast, this workbook will automatically populate the completion percentage based on the selected parameter scope. Microsoft Sentinel Project Deployment Tracker workbook offers a comprehensive, centralized view of critical deployment components, including:

item.title: Microsoft Sentinel - Custom ASIM Parser for Solarwind Data source
item.description:
This article provides guidance on creating a custom Advanced Security Information Model (ASIM) parser for a log source that is not available in the out-of-the-box (OOB) data connector but supports the syslog log format. The process involves the following steps:
First, collect sample logs from the log source to understand the data structure and fields. Next, identify the relevant schemas that the events from the log source represent. Once the schemas are identified, map the fields from the log source to the corresponding schema fields.

item.title: Protect against Next.js CVE-2025-29927 with Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF)
item.description: Next.js versions prior to 12.3.5, 13.5.9, 14.2.25 and 15.2.3 are vulnerable to bypass authorization checks within a Next.js application, according to a recently published CVE-2025-29927. It is strongly recommended to upgrade Next.js to a patched version – 12.3.5, 13.5.9, 14.2.25 or 15.2.3. For Next.js versions 11.x which currently have no patches available, or other applications based on Next.js which cannot be patched immediately - creating a custom rule in Azure WAF can help mitigate this vulnerability.
